meanings.definition: Suitable or qualified for selection or choice
meanings.sent1: The students who scored the highest marks were the eligibles for the scholarship.
meanings.sent2: Only the eligibles candidates will be invited for the final interview.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was the most eligibles pet in the house, always demanding attention.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise painted the sky with eligibles colors, making it a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: The shiny trophy gleamed in the hands of the eligibles winner.

meanings.definition: Those who are considered suitable or qualified for selection or choice
meanings.sent1: The eligibles for the job position will be notified by email.
meanings.sent2: She was among the eligibles chosen to represent the school at the competition.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends jokingly called themselves 'The Eligibles' because they were always picked first for games.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the deer seemed like the eligibles creatures, gracefully moving through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The art gallery displayed portraits of the eligibles, capturing their essence beautifully.
